game.name: 动物霓虹街：酒吧
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: "Animal Neon Street: Bar" is a simulation business cooperative game. In Zootopia, simulate running a bar, mix and unlock master drinks, build unique structures, and expand the bar through ever-changing weather and events. It supports two people to play online and experience bar life together.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Animal Neon Street: Bar" is a simulation business cooperative game. In Zootopia, simulate running a bar, mix and unlock master drinks, build unique structures, and expand the bar through ever-changing weather and events. It supports two people to play online and experience bar life together.
